link:reference.tech.01.02:Part: X - ATTRIBUTION OF INCOME IN RESPECT OF CONTROLLED FOREIGN COMPANIES
link:reference.tech.01.02:Division: 1 - Preliminary
link:reference.tech.01.02:FullReferenceText: Section 317 INTERPRETATION Division 1 - Preliminary Part X - ATTRIBUTION OF INCOME IN RESPECT OF CONTROLLED FOREIGN COMPANIES to the INCOME TAX ASSESSMENT Act 1936 Section 340 CONTROLLED FOREIGN COMPANY (CFC) Subdivision B - Controlled foreign entities (CFEs) Division 2 - Types of entity Part X - ATTRIBUTION OF INCOME IN RESPECT OF CONTROLLED FOREIGN COMPANIES to the INCOME TAX ASSESSMENT Act 1936 Subdivision D - Modifications relating to losses Division 7 - Calculation of attributable income of CFC Part X - ATTRIBUTION OF INCOME IN RESPECT OF CONTROLLED FOREIGN COMPANIES to the INCOME TAX ASSESSMENT Act 1936 Sections 456 ASSESSABILITY IN RESPECT OF CFC'S ATTRIBUTABLE INCOME, 456A REDUCTION OF SECTION 456 ASSESSABILITY WHERE ITEM SUBJECT TO FOREIGN ACCRUALS TAX, 457 ASSESSABILITY WHERE CFC CHANGES RESIDENCE FROM UNLISTED COUNTRY TO LISTED COUNTRY OR TO AUSTRALIA, 458 ASSESSABILITY IN RESPECT OF CERTAIN DIVIDENDS PAID BY A CFC & 459 ASSESSABILITY IN RESPECT OF CERTAIN DIVIDENDS DEEMED TO BE PAID BY A CFC UNDER SECTION 47A Division 9 - Attribution of attributable income and other amounts Part X - ATTRIBUTION OF INCOME IN RESPECT OF CONTROLLED FOREIGN COMPANIES to the INCOME TAX ASSESSMENT Act 1936
